title: Curiosity Concert #5: Sonic Escape
desc: Returning to Greenwich by overwhelming demand,?Sonic Escape presents ?Echoing Voices: A Musical History of America.? Travel the homelands of immigrants to hear the ?echoing voices? of our country?s heritage. Through the?story-telling power of music, imagine coming to America. Experience how the face of immigration changed, starting with the Dutch, Irish, and Germans, and evolving to the?21st Century. These ?daredevils with instruments? will tour nine regions ? the Netherlands, England, Ireland, Germany, Russia, Italy, Puerto Rico, Egypt, and China.
